content: Has anyone back ported an original contrib module for Backdrop to work with Drupal 7?
Nope. I've made a few modules for Backdrop, but haven't backported them. Don't see the point. I'm not using Drupal anymore, I'm certainly not going to port them to D8, and D7's on its way out...

I'm fairly certain D7's is not anywhere near on it's way out yet and will be around for a lot longer than Dries and the DA would like. https://twitter.com/_klausi_/status/1268260143017480192

We launched a new Drupal 7 site today, don't tell anyone :big_smile:

- klausi@mastodon.social (@_klausi_)
